content: *sleeping happily on your windowsill or in front of a drafty door this brightly-striped cat draft stopper / draft blocker will brighten your room and keep drafts out all winter long lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # bk4k-0702004 published in by kids for kids skill level easy level 2 lion® cotton article #760 2 colors 1 ball each plus fun fur® article #320 4 colors 1 ball each crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm small quantity of black embroidery thread kitty litter try and find a kind that says dustless or low dust old pair of panty hose or tights the legs need to be long enough to be able to stretch to 30 inches the denser the tights / panty hose the less likely your kitty will be to shed dust rounds are worked in continuous spirals do not turn use marker to indicate beginning of rounds some sewing and construction required to finish see also ssssssssssid the diamondback draft dodger 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/ssssssssssid-the-diamondback-draft-dodger
